adept.common

Class DocumentEventArgument.Filler

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.DocumentEventArgument.Filler
  • Enclosing class:
    DocumentEventArgument

    public static final class DocumentEventArgument.Filler
extends Object
    A filler for a role in a document-level event. Such role fillers may be of a limited number of different types, currently Entity and TemporalValue. This class represents that uncertainty. The available types may expand in the future. Please see DocumentEvent for a full description of available event classes. This class is locally immutable.
